item.title: Bow of Flames
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:13, topic:262674”][quote author=joeyjoe9876 link=topic=346847.msg2673839#msg2673839 date=1234954296]

you know its not that hard to tell i took it from the elemental, i just thought it would be a cool item lolz, and yes made the ints myself, and if you saw my post on rune server i gave credits to jagex…

looks like no one read that >.>
[/quote]

Actually i did, but i was demonstrating a different point, you said in the first sentence that you “made a new model”.

Which is not true.
You ripped from JaGeX.[/quote]Meh, i need to say this again ALREADY?

Charlie Strikes AGAIN!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Bow of Flames
item.dc:creator: @joeyjoe9876 joeyjoe9876
item.description:
@joeyjoe9876 wrote:

was bored and made a new model from a weapon that an npc was holding, its gzipped and in .dat format so all u need to do is add it to your client and if u need to do the “add model” thing then your pretty much done, making it work like a real bow is done serverside and you gotta figure that out yourself.

PICTURE:

IN-GAME:

INTS:

if(i == 13000)//model ID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 14680;//drop/inventory model class8.anInt181 = 1957; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 14679;//male equip class8.anInt200 = 14679;//female equip class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Bow of flames"; class8.aByteArray178 = "the bow that is said to be made from fire.".getBytes(); }

model link:

http://pwnscapev1.org/models/bow_of_flames.rar

this includes both the drop model and the actual model.

plz comment ^^

ok new wield model http://www.pwnscapev1.org/models/14679.gz

im used the hide command so u could see the whole thing

Read full topic
